mapper.insert: insert into tbl_auction_board (id, board_real_id, board_real_name, bs_id, cutting_sign, enable, remarks, create_time) values (#{id}, #{boardRealId}, #{boardRealName}, #{bsId}, #{cuttingSign}, #{enable}, #{remarks}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update tbl_auction_board
board_real_id = #{boardRealId},
board_real_name = #{boardRealName},
bs_id = #{bsId},
cutting_sign = #{cuttingSign},
enable = #{enable},
remarks = #{remarks},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
